column4: hi, i just bought a Belkin wireless notebook card (F5D7010 v7000) and I've been working forever to try to get it to work... it uses the ralink 2500 chipset but when i install the native drivers and try to activate it it just freezes up
feisty in #ubuntu+1 please. 7.04 is not finished yet
i may be being silly, but you may need libX11-dev or some such package for the source
